name: 5 plus 5
description:
This is my entry to "The Fresh Game Jam" Week 3. 

The Theme was "10 Seconds". 

You have 5 seconds to study your opponent's action sequence. Afterwards you have further 5 seconds to pick your action. Counter an attack with a shield. Stun your enemy to prevent his most severe attacks. And heal yourself when you have the time to. 

The Game is a little more polished than its predecessor "Galax-i". However, I am not entirely satisfied with how the Look&Feel turned out. 

The Game has 7 room with rising difficulty. There is a hard mode available in the menu which prevents you from starting single rooms again. 

Enjoy!
